dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1193 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent and expand the temporary minimum credit rate for the low-income housing tax credit program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Cantwell (for herself, Mr. Roberts, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Franken, Ms. Warren, Mr. Menendez, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Schumer, Mrs. Shaheen, Ms. Hirono, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Cardin, Mr. Leahy, Ms. Klobuchar, Mrs. Boxer, Mr. King, Mr. Booker, Mrs. Murray, Mr. Blumenthal, Mrs. Feinstein, Mr. Sanders, and Ms. Stabenow) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent and expand the temporary minimum credit rate for the low-income housing tax credit program.

section.header: Temporary minimum credit rate for the low-income housing tax credit program made permanent and expanded

subsection.header: Minimum credit amount for new buildings made permanent
subsection.text: Subparagraph (A) of section 42(b)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking with respect to housing credit dollar amount allocations made before January 1, 2015.
Subsection (b) of section 42 of such Code is amended by redesignating paragraph (3) as paragraph (4) and by inserting after paragraph (2) the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: In the case of any existing buildingâ€”

subparagraph.text: which is placed in service by the taxpayer after the date of the enactment of this paragraph, and
which is not federally subsidized for the taxable year,

paragraph.continuation-text: the applicable percentage shall not be less than 4 percent.

subsection.text: Section 42(b)(2) of such Code is amended by striking Temporary minimum and inserting Minimum.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to buildings placed in service after December 31, 2014.
